TextView.tools:text: Phone - 888.888.8888 Email - PPKR_HelpDesk@gmail.com PPKR Inc. was created to solve a common struggle amongst all students. Parking at CSULB as everyone knows is a hassle and causes a lot of frustration. In order to solve this, we have created an easy to use application that allows students to find parking much faster than usual. When a student leaves, they post their parking spot. As a student arrives, they search for a parking spot and the two clients get matched together.
